name: Warlord

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally RESIST in all battles by 50

skills.name: Bludgeon
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of increasing the duration of all debuffs on the target by 1 turn
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Protection of Gods
skills.raw_description:
Places a [Block Debuffs] buff on all allies for 1 turn. Places a [Shield] buff equal to 30% of this Champion's MAX HP on all allies for 2 turns. Restores all alliesâ€˜ HP by 25%.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Orcish Rituals
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 70% chance to put each target's Skills on cooldown. Has a 30% chance to fully deplete each target's Turn Meter.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

faction.name: Orcs
faction.default_description: Orcs is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 31 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Orcs is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 24 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Orcish tribes maintain a tenuous hold in pockets from Durham Forest to the Deadlands. Initially bred as warrior slaves, Orcs do what they must to ensure their survival, and will pick off unwitting travelers for their coin, blood and bones. Fearful of persecution by the men of Kaerok, they have sided with the Queen of Aravia.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Warlord is a legendary assist champion from the faction Orcs doing void damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Orcs, Warlord is a champion of Legendary rarity and of Assist type
